It sounds like you have all \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCTRE\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Cross The Road Electronics\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e swerve equipment (unless you don’t have a pigeon gyro) so I would encourage you to do this. When you zero your encoders, face all of your wheels aligned in the direction you want to be forwards (with their bevel gears on the inside of the bot). Then, when it runs the drive test, you can determine if it’s inverted based on the direction the wheels spin vs how you want them to spin, in accordance with their order (front right should drive forwards, back right should drive towards front right,
